name: Arc
description: $ARC is your all in one solution for Web3 and AI... In fact it's your ticket to one of the world's top 5 AI models! Instead of paying for a subscription with $ARC tokens, you unlock this powerful tool and enter a unique ecosystem designed for learning and earning. Our suite of products includes Reactor, the AI model itself, plus a mobile app and dapp for talking to the AI 24/7. These tools allow you to leverage AI for live token audits, personal wallet news feeds, and even AI-powered suggestions for trading!
